#summary Development Road Map for BigBlueButton


= Release 0.7 =
We are currently working on !BigBlueButton 0.7.  This release will focus on adding a *whiteboard* to !BigBlueButton.  The whiteboad will be implemented as annotations within the presentation module.  Other features include
   * API enhancements
   * better UTF-16 support
   * Ubuntu packages for 10.04 (32-bit and 64-bit)
   * Lots of small fixes (see [http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/list?can=2&q=milestone=Release0.7 Issues tagged for BigBlueButton 0.7])

See [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev/browse_thread/thread/33c2080e30fb5f02# Minutes from BigBlueButton committers meeting 2010-04-27] for an overview of 0.7.  

You can follow the progress of this release by subscribing to the [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev/topics?gvc=2 BigBlueButton Developers mailing list].



= Previous Releases =
To see the results of previous releases, see [ReleaseNotes BigBlueButton Release Notes].
